sourcesContent:
const simpleCode = 'A simple alert'; const disabledCode = 'This is disabled'; const childrenCode = `
Card title

Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content.

Go somewhere
`; const customClassCode = 'This is a custom class Alert'; const customThemeCode = ` Primary theme Secondary theme Dark theme Light theme Info theme Warning theme Danger theme Success theme `; const customColorCode = ` Alert with custom border color `; const borderPositionCode = ` This is a left alert! This is a right alert! This is a top alert! This is a bottom alert! This is all direction alert! This is a two direction alert! `; const sizeCode = ` Small Dismiss Medium Dismiss Large Dismiss Custom Size Dismiss `; const customEventCode = ` alert('Closed')}> This Dismiss has event handler `; export { simpleCode, disabledCode, customThemeCode, borderPositionCode, customColorCode, customEventCode, childrenCode, customClassCode, sizeCode, };
